import React,{useState}from"react";import AgoraRTC from"agora-rtc-sdk-ng";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[inCall,setInCall]=useState(false);const[client]=useState(()=>AgoraRTC.createClient({mode:"rtc",codec:"vp8"}));const[localAudioTrack,setLocalAudioTrack]=useState(null);const APP_ID="e7f6e9aeecf14b2ba10e3f40be9f56e7";// ŸáŸÖŸàŸÜ App ID ⁄©Ÿá ÿØÿßÿØ€å

const joinCall=async()=>{await client.join(APP_ID,CHANNEL,TOKEN,null);// ⁄Øÿ±ŸÅÿ™ŸÜ ŸÖ€å⁄©ÿ±ŸàŸÅŸàŸÜ

client.on("user-published",async(user,mediaType)=>{await client.subscribe(user,mediaType);if(mediaType==="audio"){const remoteAudioTrack=user.audioTrack;remoteAudioTrack.play();}});setInCall(true);};const leaveCall=async()=>{if(localAudioTrack){localAudioTrack.stop();localAudioTrack.close();}await client.leave();setInCall(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:"100vh",display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center",background:"#ffe6f0",flexDirection:"column"},children:inCall?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{color:"#ff4d88"},children:"\uD83D\uDCDE \u062F\u0631 \u062D\u0627\u0644 \u062A\u0645\u0627\u0633 \u0628\u0627 \u0639\u0634\u0642\u062A \uD83D\uDC96"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:leaveCall,style:{padding:"12px 24px",borderRadius:"25px",background:"#ff4d88",color:"white",border:"none",cursor:"pointer",marginTop:"20px"},children:"\u274C \u0642\u0637\u0639 \u062A\u0645\u0627\u0633"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:joinCall,style:{padding:"15px 30px",borderRadius:"30px",background:"#ff4d88",color:"white",fontSize:"18px",border:"none",cursor:"pointer",boxShadow:"0px 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)"},children:"\u2764\uFE0F \u0634\u0631\u0648\u0639 \u062A\u0645\u0627\u0633 \u0628\u0627 \u0639\u0634\u0642\u0645 \u2764\uFE0F"})});};export default App;
